snippet: For jihadists from North Africa to Pakistan, the attack in Paris was a justified blow against a country perceived as an enemy of Islam.
abstract: Jihadists and supporters take to social media to praise deadly terrorist attack on French newspaper Charlie Hebdo.

byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad and Mohammed Ghannam contributed reporting from Beirut, and Karam Shoumali from Istanbul.

lead_paragraph: For jihadists from North Africa to Pakistan, the attack in Paris was a justified blow against a country perceived as an enemy of Islam.

headline.main: Jihadists and Supporters Take to Social Media to Praise Attack on Charlie Hebdo
headline.print_headline: Jihadists and Supporters Take to Social Media to Praise Attack on Charlie Hebdo
